title: Statue Of Liberty National Monument: Field Trips
body: Field Trips      Results   Showing results 1-1 of 1    Sort By:  Title Date         Statue Of Liberty National Monument Visiting Liberty Island    Bringing a class to the Statue of Liberty National Monument can be a fun, memorable, and educational experience. While there are no formal curriculum-based education programs offered on Liberty Island, resources are available online for self-guided visits.    Type:Field Trips
